entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2018_concepts.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2019_concepts.csv, dqc_0094.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - C:\Users\David\AppData\Local\Temp\tmpi1ldbzqb\packages\resources.zip

[DQC.US.0071.7646] The filing has reported a value for the element us-gaap:CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold with a value of 2,232,000 using the ProductOrServiceAxis in the role 1002003 - Statement - Statement of Income (Statement) on the table us-gaap:StatementTable. However, the only member used to disaggregate the total for us-gaap:CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold was the member hsii:ReimbursementsMember. If only one member is used on this axis then the filer should either:
1. Retag the filing using the element TypeOfRevenueExtensibleList/TypeOfCostGoodOrServiceExtensibleList with a value of hsii:ReimbursementsMember and the member hsii:ReimbursementsMember should be removed from the value as it represents the aggregate value of us-gaap:CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold.
2. Tag the aggregate value of us-gaap:CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold with a value of 2,232,000 without the product of service axis. This rule will not generate an error if the aggregate value of us-gaap:CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold is reported.
The properties of this us-gaap:CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold fact are: Period :2020-04-01 to 2020-06-30 Dimensions : srt:ProductOrServiceAxis=hsii:ReimbursementsMember Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:7646 Rule version: 13.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1066605/000106660520000023/hsii-20200630.htm 4
